 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּעָה‎</span>] **verb** ==inquire==, cause to swell or boil up (Late Hebrew ***id***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***seek, suppurate, swell***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּעָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***seek***) — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּבְעֶה‎</span> [[Isa.64.1|Isa 64:1]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּבְעָיוּן‎</span> [[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעָיוּ‎</span> [[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]] — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of rising desire, ***seek, inquire***, absolute, of inquiring of prophet [[Isa.21.12|Isa 21:12]] (twice in verse). 

**2.** ***cause to boil up***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵֿשׁ‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם תִּב‎</span> [[Isa.64.1|Isa 64:1]] (but gloss [[BDB#Che|Che]]). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְעוּ‎</span> [[Obad.1.6|Obad 1:6]] ***searched out*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶחְפְּשׂוּ‎</span>); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְעֶה‎</span> [[Isa.30.13|Isa 30:13]] ***swelling, swelling out*** (of decaying wall; [[BDB#Di|Di]] ***swelling, enlarging***, of crack in wall).
